commit.message:
Address shipilev coments:
- Replace time-bound loop with an iteration of three runs.
- Add encrypt part and check to make sure the encrypted message is the same as the original.

Address shipilev's comments:
- Rename test to TestGCMSplitBound.java
- Change test range to [SPLIT_LEN - 300; SPLIT_LEN + 300].
Add TestAesGcmIntrinsic.java. The test is authored by tholenst@google.com and zlukas@google.com.
JDK-8371864: GaloisCounterMode.implGCMCrypt0 AVX512/AVX2 intrinsics stubs cause AES-GCM encryption failure for certain payload sizes
